titleStmt.title: Campanalogia: or, The art of ringing improved. With plain and easie rules to guide the practitioner in the ringing all kinds of changes. To which is added, great variety of new peals.
titleStmt.author: Stedman, Fabian, 1631?-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Godbid, for W.S. and are to be sold by Langley Curtis in Goat-Court on Ludgate-hill.,

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Fabian Stedman.
Item at reel 1537:9 identified as Wing S5374.
Reproductions of originals in the Harvard University Library and Cambridge University Library.
